item.title: Heather add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Heather add a quote by Vladimir Nabokov
item.description: "The pages are still blank, but there is a miraculous feeling of the words being there, written in invisible ink and clamoring to become visible" -- Vladimir Nabokov

item.title: Heather add a quote by Charles W. Eliot
item.description: "Books are the quietest and most constant of friends; they are the most accessible and wisest of counselors, and the most patient of teachers." -- Charles W. Eliot

item.title: Heather add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Heather add a quote by Robin Williams
item.description: "You're only given one little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it" -- Robin Williams

item.title: Heather add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Heather add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. It is not rude, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps no record of wrongs. Love does not delight in evil but rejoices with the truth. It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres." -- Anonymous

item.title: Heather add a quote by Victor hugo
item.description: "Music expresses that which cannot be put into words and that which cannot remain silent" -- Victor hugo

item.title: Heather add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Heather add a quote by John Green
item.description: "If drunk were cookies, I'd be Famous Amos" -- John Green

item.title: Heather add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "I am a badass, and I recognize that you, too, are a badass." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Heather add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Heather add a quote by Emilea
item.description: "Curiosity killed the cat, but cats have nine lives" -- Emilea

item.title: Heather add a quote by Johnny Depp
item.description: "When kids hit 1 year old, it's like hanging out with a miniature drunk. You have to hold onto them. They bump into things. They laugh and cry. They urinate. They vomit." -- Johnny Depp
